DOC.brief_summary: Obesity recognize major public health concern link potential fatal complication arise metabolic cardiovascular disease . Despite many pharmacological advance field , lifestyle strategy emphasize proper nutrient intake physical activity continue primary strategy individual fight obesity . However , controversy exists regard type timing exercise specific nutrient intake maximize fat loss , muscle gain , beneficial cardio-metabolic adaptation derive lifestyle intervention . Furthermore , limit data exists investigate impact nutrient timing time immediately exercise study examine time-of-day nutritional intake overweight obese individuals.In addition , many individual attempt improve body composition cardio-metabolic health concern food choice appropriate late evening support positive physiological adaptation . However , research-based information examine topic scarce . The investigator hypothesize consumption protein beverage late evening sleep improve body composition , cardio-metabolic health , adaptation exercise isocaloric placebo beverage . The investigator also hypothesize different digestion absorption kinetics whey casein protein elicit different effect measure variable .
DOC.brief_title: Nighttime Macronutrient Choice Combined Resistance High-intensity Interval Training
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine effect consumption protein beverage late evening sleep along combination resistance high-intensity interval train improve body composition , muscle strength overall health compare carbohydrate placebo beverage overweight obese individual . Specifically , measure heart rate , blood pressure , body composition , rest metabolism , maximal strength , cardiovascular function , hormone level , blood lipid profile , appetite , mood state , dietary intake . Specific aim study : To determine acute ingestion liquid ready-to-drink protein supplement ( 30g whey casein protein per serve ) consume late evening sleep alter physiological milieu favor anabolism alter lipolysis fat oxidation carbohydrate placebo ( 34g maltodextrin per serve ) . To determine 4 week daily protein supplementation ( supplement ) late evening along 3 day exercise train per week improve body composition , blood lipid profile , strength , cardiovascular risk profile placebo beverage .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men woman Sedentary ( exercise < 2 day per week 40 minute per session within past 6 month ) overweight obese ( BMI â‰¥ 25 ) Those exercise 2 day per week 40 minute per session ( within past 6 month ) , Those uncontrolled hypertension ( Blood Pressure ( BP ) > 160/100 mmHg ) Those take BP medication Those diagnose cardiovascular disease Those diagnosed stroke Those diagnosed diabetes Those diagnose thyroid dysfunction Those diagnose kidney dysfunction Those musculoskeletal complication would impede exercise Those smoke heavily ( > 20 cigarette per day ) Those take cholesterol medication Those take nutritional supplement ( except multivitamin ) Those allergy milk product
